allow: Bash(printf '%s\\n' 'import os' 'lines = []' 'lines.append\(""\\n}\\n\\n/* ============================================================\\n   PHASE 2 - Navigation Redesign\\n   ============================================================ */\\n\\n/* ==================== SHARED APP HEADER ==================== */\\n\\n.app-header {\\n    position: sticky;\\n    top: 0;\\n    z-index: 200;\\n    background: rgba\(7, 6, 14, 0.92\);\\n    backdrop-filter: blur\(20px\);\\n    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur\(20px\);\\n    border-bottom: 1px solid var\(--border\);\\n}\\n\\n.app-header .container { max-width: 1280px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 1.5rem; }\\n\\n.app-header .header-top {\\n    display: flex;\\n    align-items: center;\\n    gap: 1rem;\\n    height: 60px;\\n}\\n\\n.app-header .brand {\\n    display: flex;\\n    align-items: center;\\n    gap: 0.5rem;\\n    flex-shrink: 0;\\n    text-decoration: none;\\n}\\n.app-header .brand-name {\\n    font-weight: 700;\\n    font-size: 1rem;\\n    color: var\(--text-primary\);\\n    white-space: nowrap;\\n}\\n\\n.app-header .header-nav {\\n    display: flex;\\n    align-items: center;\\n    gap: 0.25rem;\\n    flex: 1;\\n    justify-content: center;\\n}\\n""\)')

Bash(__NEW_LINE_591d2e38a4e813f8__ printf '%s\\n' ".app-header .nav-link:hover { background: var\(--bg-hover\); color: var\(--text-primary\); }" ".app-header .nav-link.active {" "    background: rgba\(124, 92, 252, 0.2\);" "    color: var\(--primary-light\);" "    font-weight: 600;" "}" "" ".app-header .header-actions {" "    display: flex;" "    align-items: center;" "    gap: 0.75rem;" "    flex-shrink: 0;" "}" "" "/* ==================== MOBILE BOTTOM TAB BAR ==================== */" "" ".mobile-tab-bar {" "    display: none;" "    position: fixed;" "    bottom: 0;" "    left: 0;" "    right: 0;" "    height: 64px;" "    background: rgba\(10, 8, 20, 0.97\);" "    backdrop-filter: blur\(20px\);" "    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur\(20px\);" "    border-top: 1px solid var\(--border\);" "    z-index: 300;" "    align-items: center;" "    justify-content: space-around;" "    padding: 0 0.5rem;" "    padding-bottom: env\(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0\);" "}" "" ".tab-item {" "    display: flex;" "    flex-direction: column;" "    align-items: center;" "    gap: 2px;" "    padding: 0.3rem 0.75rem;" "    border: none;" "    background: transparent;" "    color: var\(--text-muted\);" "    cursor: pointer;" "    font-size: 0.65rem;" "    font-weight: 500;" "    border-radius: var\(--radius-md\);" "    transition: all var\(--transition-fast\);" "    min-width: 48px;" "}" ".tab-item:hover, .tab-item.active { color: var\(--primary-light\); }" ".tab-icon { font-size: 1.25rem; line-height: 1; }" ".tab-label { font-size: 0.62rem; }" "" ".tab-create-btn {" "    display: flex;" "    align-items: center;" "    justify-content: center;" "    width: 48px;" "    height: 48px;" "    border-radius: 50%;" "    background: var\(--primary\);" "    color: #fff;" "    border: none;" "    cursor: pointer;" "    font-size: 1.5rem;" "    box-shadow: 0 0 20px var\(--primary-glow\);" "    transition: all var\(--transition-fast\);" "    padding: 0;" "}" ".tab-create-btn:hover { background: var\(--primary-dark\);
